title: How to Draw a (Slightly) Sexy Girl
description: Are you an artist struggling to draw women well? That anatomy looking a bit too wonky? Is your portrayal of sexuality so stunted that your work could easily be posted on Escher Girls? Not sure how to draw the perfect pair breasts, since you have no real-life experience with one? In this informative book, you too can learn the hidden intricacies that go into drawing the feminine form.
